title: New years resolution?

replies.body:
1. Get the grades for my university offers (civil engineering for those of you that are interested) 

2. Get laid

Happy 2016 :D

replies.body:
1. Actually try at life.

2. Do more daring things, while not dying.

3. Learn how to read people by their body language, facial expressions and tone of voice.
